item.title: Cajun Chicken and Roast Veggie Rice Bowl
item.description: Serves: 2 Ingrediants 3/4 cup basmati rice 200g pumpkin peeled and chopped into 2cm chunks 1 red capsicum sliced into 1cm strips 1 zucchini chopped into 2cm chunks 1 bunch coriander roughly chopped chicken thighs 2 tbls Cajun seasoning 200g Greek yoghurt 1 clove garlic pepitas water 1.5 cups Method ROAST THE VEGGIES Place the peeled pumpkin, capsicum and zucchini on the oven tray lined with baking paper.
